How do you make broadcasting work with custom types, do I need to manually override base functions such as length, iterate, etc..?
```function apply(t::LinearTransform, x::Real)
    x = x * t.scale
end```
With a single instance t of a LinearTransform, I would want this to work as apply.(t, some_vector). It seems I manually override some base functions to do this, and I'm not sure what the overrides are for all cases.
